1.content:
Fry and Leela waited in Farnsworth's laboratory.

"I wonder why the professor called us all over here?" asked Fry

"He probably wants us to test out another of his crackpot inventions." replied Leela, rolling her one eye.

"So where have Bender and Amy gotten to?"

Just then, Bender staggered through the door followed by Amy.

"Hi guys, I was just doing my hair!" Amy said in her ever-cheery voice

"and I got a little ...sidetracked."

Bender belched an impressive array of blue and orange flames.

"Fry!" shouted Leela, putting her hands on her hips "I told you not to leave the shipment of booze out in the corridor!"

Before Fry could come up with a suitably poor excuse, Professor Farnsworth entered the room.

"Good News, everyone!" *groans of apprehension* "I've invented a new version of the What If machine!"

"That old pile of junk?" said Bender " I thought you got rid of it...again!"

Farnsworth ignored him

"Using these virtual reality helmet doohickeys, one of you can take the place of yourself within the visualization just as if you were really there, while the others watch, and guess who gets to try it out!"

The professor was met with an enthusiastic chorus of 'Sure's and 'Why Nots'.

"Well what are we waiting for then?"

Leela, Fry, Amy and Bender put on their respective helmets and braced themselves. The professor threw a lever and the What If machine jerked into life.

"Oh by the way, if you ever want to leave, then merely bend over and touch your toes and say 'Exit', otherwise you may end up trapped....FOREVER!"

"Yeah."

"Sure."

"Sounds simple enough."

"So who gets the first wish?" asked Leela

"That's a good question!" replied the Professor "-and one easily solved using my other new invention, the four sided coin!"

No one asked, this was the Professor after all.

The Professor took out the four-sided coin, each one bearing the head of a Planet Express member instead of the President and gave it a flip.

It came down-



Now for the big question, who gets the first what if?
1.title: Anthology of Interest III

choices: Fry takes the whole damned bottle.
All the Planet Express crew (apart from Bender), take one each, for the festival
Professor Farnsworth has a better solution.
11.content:
With everyone seated comfortably in their seperate chairs and with the 'What If...' machine humming away, Fry reached out and grabbed the bendable microphone. He bent over and yelled into it:

"WHAT IF I HAD AN EVER-INCREASING APPETITE!?"
"Your butt would make a hell of a floatation-device!"
"Shuddup Bender!"

Fry grabbed the lever on the side of the machine and pulled. The screens inside everyone's helments went fuzzy...

**********

"Fry, you need to eat!" said Amy.

New New York was bustling and noisy outside. The living quarters at the Planet Express Company were quiet and dozy. Nobody felt like doing much. Right now, Fry was not doing much either. To be precise, he hadn't been doing much EATING.

"What's the matter Fry? You have a stomach-ache, maybe?" Dr. Zoidberg came into the living-room, holding a cup of coffee.
"No I'm fine Dr. Zoidberg...I'm just...well...I dunno. I just lost my appetite."
"A shaaaame!" said Dr. Zoidberg, "And the New New York Festival of Feasting starts tomorrow, yes it does!"
"The festival of feasting?" said Amy, looking up from the TV which she had drifted over to, to watch.
"Yes!" said Professor Farnsworth, coming into the room, "The festival of feasting! To commemorate the great famines in the world and to celebrate the abundance of food now available! But that's what Fry knew all along! He's been fasting, haven't you, Fry?"
"No!" said Fry, "I...I don't know, I just don't feel like eating."
"That sounds serious, it does!" said Dr. Zoidberg, "You should take this, Fry. It will help with your hunger problems!"

The doctor reached into his coat and pulled out a bottle. "They're appetite increasement pills! To aid in the increasement of appetite!"
"Increasment' isn't a word, doctor," said Leela, looking up from the TV screen.
"Well that's what it says here!" said Zoidberg.
"Oh fine, I'll have one," said Fry.
"Have all!" said the doctor, "I can get plenty more."
11.title: Fry's Flabulous Adventure - Part I

112.content:
That night, Fry opened the bottle and tipped the pills out into a bowl. He picked up the bottle and started reading...

"Appetite Increasement Pills"

NEW!
IMPROVED!
CHOCOLATE FLAVOURED

Take one pill for a momentary boost in appetite!
Take two for a prolonged boost in appetite!
Take three for a day of good feasting!

**WARNING**

Overconsumption of pills may result in permanent damage to appetite and digestive system.

"Meh," Fry said. Taking out a knife, he started cutting out all the pills. A soft brown powdery thing...possibly powder, poured out. He tipped the powder into a mug of milk and mixed the whole thing around. He gulped it down and repeated the process until all the pills which had been emptied from the bottle into the bowl on his desk in his bedroom, were nothing but little empty plastic tubes. Fry climbed into bed. The next day was going to be interesting.
112.title: Fry takes the whole bottle.

choices: One hour later. What's happened to Fry now?
Leela runs after Dr. Zoidberg in panic!
1121.content:
"Bleeeerrrrrp!"
"Fry! That's disgusting!"
"BLEEEERRRRRRRRRRRRP!!"

A huge blast of smoke and flames rushed out of Bender's mouth. He broke the top off another bottle of beer and started slugging it down. Leela groaned and got up from the table.

"What's up, Fry?" Bender asked. Fry was sitting at the kitchen table gobbling down food. So far, he'd finished two boxes of Crispy Nut cinnamon cereal, three bottles of milk and two plates of pancakes.
"Just..." said Fry, taking another mouthful of eggs and sausages, "...getting my stomach tuned..." he took another bite, "...for today..."
"Tuned? Stretched looks like it," said Amy, coming into the room, "I suppose you took some of Dr. Zoidberg's pills, right?"
"Yeah," said Fry.
"Come on, guys," said Leela, walking back into the dining-room, "We'll have to leave in a few minutes."

Fry guzzled down another large glass of milk and wiped his mouth with his sleeve. He let out another burp. Leela groaned.

"Good news, everyone! The feast will be starting in about half an hour! We'd better get going if we're going to reach Times Square on time!" said the professor, walking into the room, "Egads, Fry! I thought you were fasting?"
"He was," said Bender, getting up, "Now he's slowing. And he's beginning to notice all the food that he whizzed past in the process of fasting, so now he's reversing to cram it all in!"
"Shuddup, Bender!" said Fry. He struggled out of his kitchen chair and shuffled out the door. Leela turned off the TV and they headed out.

**********

"Well!" said the professor, "Here we are! Each part of the square is dedicated to a certain type of food! Over there is Asian, over there is European! Elzar has his own corner over there..."

Bender promptly headed off to Elzar's corner.

"...and the universal corner is where we are now," said Farnsworth, "Take your time. The feast lasts all day!"

Within five minutes, Fry, Leela and Amy were shuffling from stall to stall, trying out food. Cubert and Dwight shuffled along behind them, grabbing all the snacks that their hands could reach.

"Hey look," said Leela, "They have those miniature fruit-trees! You remember Fry?"

Fry nodded, "You brought one to my housewarming party."
"Yeah...Hey, seeds!" said Leela. She opened her purse to buy a bag of fruit-tree seeds.
"So what do you think, should we start a sort of miniature...FRY!"

Fry had left Leela when she'd turned to pay for the seeds. He had charged on ahead and was now reaching willy-nilly into the stalls, grabbing at all kinds of food. Hotdogs, rice, pies, cakes, cookies, barbequed sneezles and roast chicken.

"What's the matter, Leela?" said Dr. Zoidberg walking up to her. His claws were full of cans of anchovies.
"Where did you get those?" Leela asked, suspiciously.
"They invented a cloning machine! They're making millions of them!" said the doctor, "Now what's wrong?"
"Fry! He seems to have gone nuts!" Leela pointed. Down the street, at least three blocks away by now, Fry was still charging ahead. Grabbing at one thing, stuffing it in his mouth, reaching for another thing, swallowing what was in his mouth and cramming the new sample of food into his gaping hole to replace the sample which had previously been in residence there.

"I see the pills worked!" said the doctor, happily.
"But he's..."
"Relax, Leela, the pills wear off!...If he followed the instructions," said the doctor, "Now, if you'll excuse me, I see a custard eclaire with my name on it..."
"Uh-oh," said Leela, when she heard the doctor's last words. Knowing Fry, he wouldn't have read the instructions...
1121.title: Fry's Flabulous Adventure - All the pills.

choices: "Could you get me some more food? Lots! I'm really hungry..."
"...we can go and try all the Chinese food!"
11211.content:
"Doctor!" Leela shouted, but Dr. Zoidberg was soon lost in the crowd of thousands of hungry New New Yorkers, bustling here and there looking for the next best thing since sliced bread.

After an hour of fruitless searching, Amy noticed Fry sitting down in a foodcourt set up on Broadway. All around the sidewalk were stalls selling hotdogs, pasta, pizza and roast beef. Making sure that Fry wasn't about to wander off, Amy rushed back to the middle of Times Square and grabbed Leela by the arm.

"I found him!!" Amy hissed in Leela's ear as she dragged her friend through the crowd. Leela staggered around so that she could run alongside Amy instead of being dragged along behind her and together, they rushed through the crowd.

"There he is!" said Amy. She pointed to a table in the middle of the foodcourt. Fry was sitting in a chair, trays, bowls and plates stacked on the table in front of him, almost hiding his face.

"There you are!" said Leela, walking towards the table, "Amy and I were worried sick about...Oh my God!"

Fry belched and wiped his mouth with a sleeve of his read jacket again. "Huh?" he looked up, "Oh hi Leela! You gotta try this shrimp ravioli! It's delicious!"
"I can tell," said Leela. She looked down. Fry's stomach was inflated to the size of a small beachball and his belt and fly were undone to give his bloated foodbag room to breathe.

"You look disgusting," said leela, "Now come on! We still have all the Asian cuisine to try out."
"Yeah sure," said Fry, "Right when I'm done here."
"When will that be?" Leela asked, her hands on her hips.
"When I'm full."

Leela let out another groan and slapped a hand to her forehead. "Fine!"
"Great!" said Fry, "Then..."
11211.title: Fry Found.

choices: Amy, Bender and Leela keep feeding Fry.
The Professor sends them to Culinaria, a planet made of food. Fry starts goring.
112111.content:
"Come on, Amy," said Leela, "Let's go find Lord Chomper here, some more food."
"Okaaawwaaaaah!!" Amy tripped over a table-leg and fell flat on her face. Leela groaned and helped her friend to her feet.

"Bring lots!" said Fry, who was now reaching out for food which was being pushed past on a trolley by a fat Italian man.

"Hey Fry!"
Bender clunked over, "You're really chowing down, aren't you?" he said, and he let out an evil laugh, "Hey don't worry, I brought you something!" Bender opened his door and pulled out an entire stack of pies.
"I pinched them from Elzar's! Here, you're the only one between us who can eat, so you might as well!" The robot dumped the pies on the table. Fry burped and started on the pies. Bender got up to leave when he felt two people behind him.

"Bender! We were about to feed Fry..." Leela let out yet another exasperated groan, "You gave him ALL those pies?"
"Why not?" Beder asked, "I can't eat them! And he looks like he could a cow!"
"He probably already has!" said Amy, "Here, Fry." She dumped huge cups of french fries and chicken nuggets and spring rolls dipped in sauce, onto the table. Fry reached out blindly with his hands, stuffing his face.

"He certainly looks like he's getting bigger," said Leela. Fry's face was all puffy and chubby now, and a second chin was beginning to form. His belly bulged out of the confines of his clothes and his shirt started riding up...
112111.title: Fry's Flabulous Adventure - Feeding fries to Fry.

1121112.content:
"Good news, everyone!" said the professor, walking in on the four friends. Fry belched and reached out for a huge bucket of coke to gulp down.

"What is it, professor?" said Leela. She was helping herself to some barbequed sneezle.

"I need you all to head back to the offices..."
"But we'll miss out on the feasting!" Amy wailed.
"No you won't!" said the professor, "I have a delivery for you to make. I need you to deliver several crates of spices to Culinaria!"
"Culinaria?" said Leela, "I never heard of the place."
"Oh yes, Culinaria!" said the professor, "A land made ENTIRELY of food! The people there are very creative and very friendly! They're celebrating today, as well. You may continue your festivities there!"
"Great!" said Fry, struggling to his feet, "Let's -- Bluuuuuurrp! -- Go!!"
"Well alright," said Leela, "How far, professor?"
"Oh not very far. Only an hour!" said the professor, "In fact, I might come with you. Hmmm...I haven't had minced bull-testicles in ages..."
"Eeeeew!" said Amy.
"I'm only joking, Amy. But they do have some wonderful food there...come on!"

Leading the way through the crowd, the professor climbed into one of the large plastic tubes which transported people around New New York. One by one, they climbed in, each one shouting out "PLANET EXPRESS HEADQUARTERS!" as they started rising upwards through the tube. Fry succeeded in losing his jeans in the tube and they were spat out afterwards when he'd made his less-than-graceful landing outside the Planet Express headquarters.
1121112.title: Good news everyone! You'll be going to Culinaria!

choices: Culinarians see Fry's huge appetite and decide to feed him forever.
Zap Brannigan shows up to join in the feast.
11211121.content:
"Leela! How much fuuurther!?" Fry wailed. He was starving. After finding some clothes which halfway fit him, he'd shuffled onto the spaceship and they'd all taken off to Culinaria, but not before loading on crates filled with pepper, salt, cinnamon, paprika and various other spices.

"According to the radar, we should be there soon!" said Leela, "Just hold on!"
"THERE!" shouted the professor, pointing out the window, "Over there! Hard right, Leela! And careful!"

Leela turned the ship hard over and a large, multicoloured planet came into view. The ship raced towards it and then came in to land. Leela lowered the landing-gear and the spaceship came down with a 'clunk!'

"WELCOME TO CULINARIA!!"

A fat man wearing purple robes rushed up to the ship. Professor Farnsworth was the first person to get off. He smiled at the fat man and waved, "Good afternoon! Yes, we have your delivery of spices!"
"Excellent! Excellent! Come, your crew must be exhausted!" said the man, "My name is Lucia and this is my planet! Feel free to eat whatever you like!"

"Food!...Fooooood!" Fry moaned, weakly. He crashed down the steps of the ship and landed flat on his face.

"Ugh, he doesn't look too good," said Lucia.
"He's just hungry," said Leela, appearing behind Fry, "Where can we get some eats?"
"Anywhere you like!" said Lucia, "But please do not eat any of the buildings! My people will be most upset!"

"Come on, guys!" said Amy.

**********

Within ten minutes, all the crew of the Planet Express-ship were shuffling around Culinaria, stuffing their faces. Everyone else was doing the same, so they didn't feel bad about it.

"CAVIAR!!" Dr. Zoidberg screamed, jumping into a huge swimming-pool filled with the stuff. He gulped it down greedily.

"Oh my god! A FOUNTAIN OF BOOZE!" Bender wailed. He rushed towards it and jumped in. Professor Farnsworth picked up a cup and gulped down some of the beer. "It's so cold!" he said.
"It should be!" Lucia replied, "the fountain's base is made of ice!"
"Soooo cold!..." said the professor, dumpng the cup into the fountain for more beer.

"WOW!"

Fry had finally found what he wanted. Towering mountains of nothing but food. All kinds of food, too many kinds to mention! Finding a chair and table, Fry started carrying huge mounds of food over to it and began eating.
11211121.title: Welcome to Culinaria!!

choices: Fry is locked in a cell and is force-fed food around the clock...
Fry is brought before the king for an appeal.
112111211.content:
"Has anyone seen Fry?" Amy asked. She was shuffling along munching on a caramel bar. Leela gulped down slices of pizza and didn't seem to hear her.
"I said..." said Amy, taking another bite of the candybar, "Has anyone seen Fry?"
"Fry?" Leela asked, "No. Not since he went looking for food!"
"Why would he do that?" Bender asked, walking up, "the whole place is made of food! Even food for robots!" Bender opened his door and pulled out a huge beer-mug and turned on a fire-hydrant. Rich foamy beer blasted out and into the gigantic tankard.

"Bender! That beer's for emergency purposes only!" said Leela, "Be a bit more considerate!"
"I am!" said Bender, "I'm drinking their emergency beer so that there's enough regular beer to go around!"
"Oh forget it..." said Leela. She reached out and yanked a branch off a hotdog tree and started munching on the fat sauages hanging off the branches. "So..." she said, between mouthfuls, "Fry."
"Yeah," said Amy, "Where is he?"
"Over there, I think," said Leela. She pointed down a path off a main road. Through several dozen trees which were in full bloom, displaying their array of chocolates, marshmallows and candy-apples, they could see huge mountains of food.

"Ah," said Lucia, "Through the Forest of Confectionaries is the Mmmalayas!"
"The 'Mmmalayas?" Leela asked.
"Yes," said Lucia, waddling after her, "We called them that because the food there is so delicious."
"There he is!" said Leela. After walking a little way into the forest, snatching stuff from the trees as they went, they saw Fry lying against a huge boulder and grabbing at everything he could eat. The boulder was a gigantic chocolate-ball and Fry's back was pressed against it. He reached behind him and ate whatever he could lay his hands on.

"Those pills that Dr. Zoidberg gave him must really have boosted his appetite alright," said Leela.
"Look at him..." said Amy. And they did.

Fry had climbed on top of the chocolate boulder now, and he was lying on top of it with his back pressed against another boulder. He was reaching blindly behind him and stuffing everything he could find into his mouth, eclaires, tofffee, cakes, pies, tarts and huge chocolate cookies. His jeans were completely opened and his shirt had been stretched over his increasingly huge belly. Fry didn't even notice them. He just kept eating. It wasn't until nearly six hours later that he realised anyone was even looking for him. He struggled to his feet and tried to tug his jeans up. They ripped apart and he kicked them off, removing his red jacket at the same time. Now, he was only wearing his usual white T-shirt and white briefs, and even they were beginning to get too small. He waddled down the path, from the mountains, between the trees and back into town. The people of Culinaria were out en masse tonight. Enormously fat children waddled everywhere, munching on all kinds of food. Fry shuffled around. His laden belly wobbled and sagged, but he only rubbed it and tried to eat more.

"Wow..." said Leela, "He certainly enjoyed himself."
"Yes..." said Professor Farnsworth, "But we must be going! Fry!"

Fry belched and looked up. His face was covered in red sauce from stuffing down an entire pot of spaghetti.

"Yeah hold on!" he said. He scratched his rear end and kept shuffling between the food stalls. Suddenly, there was a loud 'CRUNCH!' that made everyone jump. Fry had bitten into the window-sill of a house!

"Fry what are you doing!?" the professor shouted, "Didn't you hear what Lucia said? NO EATING BUILDINGS!"

But it was too late. In more speed than anyone could possibly have given them credit for, the Culinarian police force had surrounded Fry and taken him into custody.

"Where are they taking him!?" Leela asked one of the civilians.
"Well," said the man, licking a huge ice-cream the size of his head, "If he's so hungry that he's going to eat other people's houses, then the King of Culinaria will give him a test."
"Test?" Leela asked.

The man nodded, "He must eat a hundred times his weight in food. If he succeeds, he will be set free. If he does not succeed, then the number will continue to rise."

The man shook his head, "He will probably end up immobile."
"Wow..." said Leela.
112111211.title: Fry's Flabulous Adventure - Culinaria is heaven.

choices: They finish, zapp's belt snaps halfway through.
They finish, zapp's belt makes it through in one piece.
112111212.content:
Zapp showed up and immediately went to leela. "leela! What a surprise! I was just in the neighborhood and i was hungry so i decided to stop for something to eat." zapp stated.
"well we had a delivery here so we stayed here. Are you sure you're not following me?" leela questioned.
"no, i was just hungry. Don't worry, even after i'm done eatinh here i'll still have the body of a god. HOLY CRAP! What happened to fry? It looks like the buttons are about to pop off that new shirt, and his belt looks like it's about to-" *SNAP* fry's belt had snapped from the pressure his belly had been putting on it. Fry came over and tried to take zapp's belt, but zapp swatted his hands away. " no, no, no fry. If anyone's about to burst this belt, it's me. I challenge you to an eating contest". Fry accepts and:
112111212.title: Zap Brannigan shows up to join in the feast.

choices: Bender Put the pills on both plates
Leela got all of the pills on her plate
Fry Recieved all of the pills
113.content:
"One second thought I better not take these. I'm eating enough pills as it is." he said popping 9 pills in one gulp.
The crew sighed. "I'll take the bottle." said Leela. "I can get him to take it through some of my methods." said Leela taking the bottle.
The crew went on with their usual day while preparing for the festival of feasting.
Leela sat in her rooms looking at the pills, couriously. "Hwo should I give these to Fry?.....Aha! I've got it."
Leela knew alot about Fry but one thing was for sure was that he loved mashed potatoes.

Later that day Leela told Fry about a surprise she had for him. He waited in the break room.
Leela came in and sat across from Fry. "Are you ready?" she said slightly seductively. "Of Course!" he said with hope in his voice.
Bender came in holding two plates of mashed potatoes. "Here's your surprise!" said Leela.
"Oh boy! Oh boy!" he cheered. Bender winked at Leela. "Don't worry I put in the 'extra ingredient' like you asked for Fry." he said whistling out of the room.

"Well. Let's dig in." said Leela eating a spoonful. "Mph. This tastes different.." said Fry.

Little did they know that...
113.title: Fry refuses.

choices: Bender screams No! And throws the potatoes away
1132.content:
Leela shoved spoonful after spoonful of mashed potatoes in her mouth.
Fry noticed she began to eat faster and faster. "What's going on with Leela?" he though accidental putting mashed potatoes in his eye. Leela didnt notice.
Leela's hunger increased but, alas the plate was empty. She the. Reached for Fry's plate and ate his potatoes.
Farnsworth came in. "Good News, Everyone! The Festival of Feasting has just started!" Leela darted out of the door.
The Proffesser and Fry exchanged looks of confusion. The crew got themselves ready for the festival. Bender showed up holding a pot. "Hey, whatcha got there, mon?" asked Hermes in fear. "Its my recipe for mashed potatoes with a little 'special ingredient' that I stole from Ziodberg."
"Hm. Doesn't sound deadly." said Farnsworth. "May we try?"
1132.title: Leela got all of the pills on her plate

114.content:
"Meh. Couldn't hurt to try." said Fry taking a pill with the rest of the Planet Express Crew following suit. Except Bender who felt left out.
"Do god! Damnit! How come humans get everything!" he angrily grumbled while storming away. Everyone shrugged it off. "He'll be fine." said Farnsworth taking his pill.

The whole Planet Express did the same thing.

The next day at the fair.

Captain Zap Brannigan was up on stage. "With this honorary pair of safety scissors I will proudly open up the festival of feasting." there were 2 snips and the of the ribbon and nothing happened. Inside the crowd the Planet Express crew tried to quiet their grumbling stomach and watering mouths.

"Just cut the ribbon you jackass!" screamed Hermes picking up a blade of glass and hurling it towards Zap. He ducked out of the way and the glass cut the ribbon. "What the hell?" Zap cursed. The festival opened up and the crew was ready to eat as much as they can.
114.title: All the Planet Express crew (apart from Bender)...

choices: Fry and Bender return to a stuffed Leela.
Leela gets up and sees whats going on with the others.
12.content:
"All right!" said Leela

She leaned over to the mike.

"What if Bender and Fry actually pulled their weight around here?"

"Hey!" Fry and Bender shouted in unison

Leela reached out and pulled the lever on the machine's side. Leela's expression went blank and she slumped back into her chair as everyone else went into spec-mode.

*****

Leela opened her eye to find herself on the couch of the Planet Express lounge and was initially surprised to find neither Fry nor Bender occupying their usual spot, then she remembered why she was there. An open packet of chips lay next to her, Fry's favourite brand- Flarg Puffs. Leela picked up the packet which she noticed to be half-empty already and munched absent mindedly on the puffy treats while she got her bearings.

"Mmm, these are good!" she said to herself "I can see why Fry likes them, i'd have tried these before if he didn't always wolf them down first!"

Leela glanced around the room guiltily.

"Well, it's only a virtual reality simulation I guess. Here goes!"

Leela dumped the rest of the packet's contents into her mouth just as Fry and Bender entered the room, giving Leela a shock and nearly causing her to choke.

Fry looked a little different from normal. While he still wore his usual shirt and red jacket, he was a lot more in shape than the Fry Leela knew, he was practically ripped! His usual vacant expression was replaced with one of idiotic bravado. Bender looked pretty much the same, except this one had taken the time to keep his exterior polished and all his parts in perfect working order.

"Hey, Leela" said Fry "-lazing around on the couch as usual?"

Leela angrily tried to point out that she was the one who did all the work around but it came out as 'Mphphmphm!'

Leela swallowed her mouthful of puffs and opened her mouth, then remembered again that she was in a simulation, and one where Fry and Bender seemed to actually be competent and assumedly, she just lazed around.

"Good news everyone!" came a familar voice, as the Professor entered "I have another highly dangerous and top-profile delivery mission!"

"Where are we going?" asked Leela

"Sorry, Leela- this mission is far too important for an incompetent delivery girl such as yourself. That's why i'm asking Captain Fry and Assistant Captain Bender to do it!"

"Fry? Captain?!" said Leela

"Are you alright, Leela?" asked Fry "You don't seem to be yourself just now."

"I'm fine, i just um... have a headache, yeah!" said Leela hurriedly

"Well we're off on another highly dangerous and exciting mission!" said Bender "See ya around, ya lazy meatbag!"

and with that, Fry and Bender left.

"So is there anything I can-"

"Oh no, don't try to help with anything at all!" the Professor interrupted, "Just stay here and try not to make a nuisance of youself, there's a good girl."

A few minutes later, Leela found herself alone in the Planet Express Lounge.

"May as well make myself comfortable." Leela decided

Leela found the kitchen area and grabbed a can of chilled Slurm from the fridge and a deluxe packet of Flarg Puffs and returned to the lounge. Parking her soon-to-be-not-so toned rear on the couch, she broke the seal on the Slurm can and gulped down the cool, refreshing liquid. Her eye widened.

"Wow, this stuff is good!" said Leela. Leela set the can of Slurm on the arm of the couch as she switched on the TV with one hand and helped herself to handfuls of puffs with the other.

"I could get used to this!" sighed Leela happily through a mouthful of slurm and puffs.
12.title: Delivery Girl Leela, meet Captain Fry.

choices: Leela gives up and cleans the stock room
Leela has all afternoon to clean it, Chocolate is for now!
121.content:
Leela munched the bag of Flarg Puffs and killed the last of her Slurm while watching an old re-run of The Scary Door. Leela's hand hit the bottom of the bag and she looked down at it puzzled. "Where did they all go?" she thought turning the bag upside down to try to find them, sadly she watched as only crumbs fell out and landed on her midsection which seemed oddly less toned, where once was a modest hard washboard stomach was nothing but a simple fleshy one, not fat of course but it looked like she'd never really taken much care in exercise.

"Wha-?" she looked at it puzzled "I need to do some crunches and fast, this is unacepta-" she was cut off as a commercial for Chocolate Fudge Covered Chocolate Fudge Bars.

"All the goodness of Fudge spread over a tasty layer of pure fudgey goodness!" The announcer voiced as an image of two biniki clad women poured chocolate all over more chocolate... and each other "Warningfudgemayormaynotcontainfiftypercentrecycledlard!" he quickly blurted out as the commercial ended. Leela's Mouth filled with saliva.

"Ooooh Chocolate fudge bars..." she said dreamily "No!" she shook her head, "I need to get back into shape and..." the image of all that chocolate forced it's way back into her mind "Maybe just one... or two." she thought.

Leela hurried into the kitchen sure there was a box or two left. Hermes was coming out of his office when Leela nearly ran him over.

141.content:
"As you all know," Bender began, "it has always been my lifelong dream to become a great chef..." "Don't remind me," Fry groaned. "I'm still recovering from last week's 'Dumpster Surprise.'" "What're you griping about?" Bender replied, a tad irked. "You still got all your organs, right?"

"BENDER!" the Professor shouted. "Ask the damn question while I'm still alive to hear it! So make it fast!" "All right, already!" Bender snapped. "What if I was the greatest chef in the universe?"

The Professor pulled the lever...

**********

"Slop's on, everyone!" Bender bellowed as he rang the dinner bell. "And so's lunch!"

The crew groaned and moaned as they reluctantly trudged into the dining room. Upon entering, however, they were astonished to see a delicious-looking buffet covering the table! "Something's wrong here," Leela said. "This actually looks like food." "Yeah, what gives, Bender?" Fry asked. "Did you rob a soup kitchen again?" "Nah, they locked the doors this time," Bender replied. "I made all this myself! You guys enjoy while I get dessert started!"

With that, the robot headed back into the kitchen, humming to himself. The crew looked at their meals with mouth-watering trepidation. "So..." Leela said, "who takes the first bite?" "Well, according to your employee contracts," Hermes started, pulling out a thick stack of papers, "section 42, subsection 7-G, paragraph 1138, line 867.530-9 states that in the event of the staff being served potentially lethal food or drink, the employee who queries about which of the staff members in attendance shall test said food or drink must test it him-or-herself. In other words: Get to chowin', ya one-eyed lab rat!"

Muttering numerous vulgar and creative remarks about Hermes, his parentage, and his position on the evolutionary ladder under her breath, Leela speared a forkful of buggalo steak, closed her eye tight, and stuck the fork in her mouth. She chewed once...twice... Then her eye shot open so wide that for a brief moment it actually appeared to be larger than her skull. She frantically grabbed as much food as she could, heaping some onto her plate with one hand and shoving the rest into her mouth with the other.

Seeing as Leela hadn't dropped dead yet, the rest of the crew carefully tried bites of their own platefuls...and immediately joined Leela in gorging themselves as fast as they could. The food disappeared at speeds to boggle the imagination. When Bender emerged from the kitchen a half-hour later, the table was clean. Everyone was sitting back in their chairs, licking fingers and rubbing stuffed bellies. "Bender, that was amazing!" Amy said, burping a little as she spoke. "Indeed!" Zoidberg added. "I now know what it feels like to be full of things other than whatever that 'it' everyone keeps talking about is!" The Professor mumbled something incoherent about probability and drifted off to sleep.

"Bender, I don't know how the hell you became such a great chef, but you gotta into business!" Hermes said. "And with a certain handsome bureaucrat to organize things for you, you could be even bigger than Elzar!" "A chance to humiliate my greatest idol and get rich doing so?" Bender ruminated. "I'll do it!"
